intro.pargraphe1: My passion is to support you all the way through , companies and independant who want to create a website.
intro.pargraphe2: I could helped you  all the way through of your project, to start with since  the specification note, then the passing by the design of the website but also with to  the integration and finally the development of the fonctionnalities. Not forgetting, SEO optimizations and its production.
intro.pargraphe3: Graduated from a master I and actually student in  a master II, I did acquire a lot of experience in digital thanks to the différents projects I did work on. I am confident to have assets to support you in your future project.
intro.pargraphe4: Maybe you can see that I’m passionate about Japan and its culture.

skills.name: Web development
skills.description: Creation or redesign of website! I support you in your tailor-made developments. Whether with frameworks (VueJS, React, ...) or with a content management system (CMS) like Wordpress.

skills.name: Project management
skills.description: I will guide you through all the phases necessary to bring your site online, from the needs analysis to the coordination of the various stages of implementation. This ranges from the choice of external resources to adapted technologies.

skills.name: Communication
skills.description: You want to promote your website ! I can assist you in creating communication elements, whether is  newsletters, banners or visuals for social networks.

skills.name: UX/UI design
skills.description: You want a graphic identity that represents you! I will help you with the creation of logos, graphic charters and web interfaces using various tools.
